description.value:
You add two of the following powers to your spellbook.

@UUID[Compendium.dnd-4e-compendium.module-powers.UVHbWu2i7DNly5Zc]{Beneficient Transformation}@UUID[Compendium.dnd-4e-compendium.module-powers.uNP7qLvnkcfMb5w4]{Dimension Switch}@UUID[Compendium.dnd-4e-compendium.module-powers.9KdVGyJfZuXbjrHL]{Fly}@UUID[Compendium.dnd-4e-compendium.module-powers.ZaA84yuedKfTJxNW]{Phantom Mask}
